author: National Geographic
description: Secrets of the Penguins premieres April 20 on National Geographic, streaming next day on Disney+ and Hulu.
title: From Africa to Antarctica, discover extraordinary penguin footage. #SecretsOfThePenguins #ourHOME

author: National Geographic
description:
Boston celebrates its legacy through its museums, monuments, and plaques, unlike any other American city. But although revered and honored, Boston's early settlers upheld practices that were anything but admirable by today’s standards. Here are four stories that put this shocking reality on display. Discover the oppression of Irish Catholics, Metacomet's Rebellion, the Salem Witch Trials, and Onesimus, the enslaved man who helped end smallpox.

Want more hidden history and exclusive insights about a variety of trending topics? Follow Kahlil Greene, the Gen Z Historian: www.youtube.com/@UCJ-_fYzUtEXDWMTYzTtM_lw

Explore the World with National Geographic subscriptions: http://natgeo.com/ytngmagazine
